anasini siktiniz oyunun. alinmamasi veya oynanmamasi icin sebepler.

2+2+2 zorunlu hale getirildi.

kalkanlar zayiflatildi. guc seviyeleri dusuruldu.

hanzonun scatter arrowu, Symmetra'nin teleportu, mercy Resurrection ozellikleri kaldirildi.  Brigitte'in amina koyuldu.

mcgree ismini degistirdiler.

doom ile orisa soytari hale getirildi.

2. oyundaki haritalar 1. oyundaki haritalardan daha kotu halde.

sesler degistirilerek daha kotu hale geldi.

yarrak gibi co-op vardi. simdide parali hale getirmisler 15 dolar 400tl. multiplayer haritalarinda kim niye botlara karsi oynasin. yapacaksaniz farkli harita dizayni yapin.

birileri de sey yazmis. 7 yil oldu halen turck dil destegi yok. lan oglum oyunun amina kodular turkce dil destegi olsa nogulacak. ana menuyu turkce gorunce noguluyor? birak eksik kalsin. skinleri para ile satan sirketten cok fazla bir istek turkce dili.

My Overwatch 2 first-try experience:

Open game, alt-tab to link my Blizzard account to my Steam, game crashes when tabbing back.
Try again, same outcome happens.
Use my phone to link my account, figured changing the game to full screen windowed would keep it from crashing when tabbing back after alt tabbing -- still crashes.
Decides to not tab for a while, queue on an Unranked Free For All.
Sit in queue for around to 12 minutes before I get a game.
Finally get a game, after having an unusually good performance for someone good at the game I find out I played with nothing but bots.

Needless to say that the game was uninstalled right after.

I only downloaded this to get my achievements. I used to love OW during OW1 when the game was good. As soon as daddy Jeff left Blizzard did what it does and killed the game. OW2 should have been a patch update and its so shitty that this company is proud of lying to its consumers about free pve content and then cancelled most of it while simultaneously putting original free content behind a pay wall.

Also Blizzard is god fucking awful at making skins, most of the skins in game are so hideous and horrendous I dont understand how they were approved and added to the game to begin with.
best game ever! i LOVE this game!

I have 600 hours in OW1+2 (calculated this off hero times in QP)

This game is pathetic. 
- Ow1 lootboxes sucked, but at least YOU EARNED THEM. I have played ow2 for like 100 hours. I have earned NOTHING. You get fuck all on the free battlepass.
- WHERE IS PVE CAMPAIGN
- WHERE IS PVE CAMPAIGN
- YOU SPENT 3 YEARS NOT UPDATING THE GAME WHERE IS PVE CAMPAIGN
- Game is stuffed full of niche performance issues that blizzard will literally tell you is because you are running basic software. My PC is more than enough to run the game. It works for the 90%, so they let the 10% squaller. Never had a single problem during ow1's lifetime.
- Blizzard is obsessed with tinkering the heck out of the game's balance. Every new patch adjusts every other hero a slight amount just to throw you off, having no real effect on the actual game. 
- Then the tinkering will add up, sneaking up slowly, until one patch everyone realises x is useless or y is OP, and it breaks the game's meta completely.
- WHERE IS PVE CAMPAIGN

Blizzard literally had the game of 2016. They had the gaming community by the nutsack. Now look at this pathetic state. TF2 literally lived through OW1, and killed OW2. So much for the TF2 killer lmfao
Plz add the porn part in the game.
I wish i could turn back time....

do not listen to all the negative reviews of this game.

Overwatch deserves every negative review it gets, but I paid $40 for this game in 2016 and it's still alive with regular updates even if I don't think they're good. Blizzard has consistently lied about promised content, trying to force an E-Sport community on a non-competitive and broken game. I wouldn't recommend spending any money and just enjoy it at a casual level otherwise you'll become frustrated and resent the game.
